segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene that seems quite active.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink, which is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the edge in a steady stream, creating a widening puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is spilling out without anyone noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in the water, yet she shows absolutely no reaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite alarming to see such a hazard going completely unaddressed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry someone might slip on that wet floor and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation is definitely building up to an unfortunate accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water must be damaging the cabinets too, running down their fronts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope she becomes aware before something serious happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside the window is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to unfold, right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
